is_new(entry, url)¶

checks if a story is new

Parameters

  • entry (dict) – stores the link, original story range (lower, upper) and most recent story range

  • url (str) – story url to open

Return type

bool

Returns

a boolean indicating if the story is new

show(window, entry, width=80, color=4)¶

adds the story to the proper location on the screen

Parameters

  • window (NewType()(cw, window)) – curses window object

  • entry (dict) – story dictionary metadata

  • width (int) – width that the story displays on the screen

  • color (int) – story display color

str

Returns
